topic.title: Review Of Systems Section - conformance rules

lines.i: The Review of Systems section contains a relevant collection of symptoms and functions systematically gathered by a clinician. It includes symptoms the patient is currently experiencing, some of which were not elicited during the history of present illness, as well as a potentially large number of pertinent negatives, for example, symptoms that the patient denied experiencing.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:10469 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.18"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15435)/@code="10187-3" REVIEW OF SYSTEMS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15436)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15435)/@code="10187-3" REVIEW OF SYSTEMS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15436)
